question: ‘Higher Education Leadership Development Programme for Administrator’ is a programme launched of Union Ministry?
option3: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation:
The Union Minister for Human Resource Development, Shri Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank recently launched a programme called ‘Higher Education Leadership Development Programme for Administrator’.
It is a joint initiative of University Grants Commission (UGC) and British Council under the support of UK India Education and Research Initiative (UKIERI). The main objective of the programme is to train the senior and middle level administrators in Indian Universities.
